items.text: Fixed an issue with incorrect code generation when targeting armv7 devices. (61901594)
items.html: Fixed an issue with incorrect code generation when targeting armv7 devices. (61901594)

items.text: watchOS and tvOS apps with asset catalogs built with Xcode 11.4 or later may experience slower image-loading performance on devices running on watchOS 6.1 or earlier, or when in Dark Mode on tvOS 13.3 or earlier. (62328605)Workaround: Add a symbol glyph to the app’s asset catalog.
items.html:
watchOS and tvOS apps with asset catalogs built with Xcode 11.4 or later may experience slower image-loading performance on devices running on watchOS 6.1 or earlier, or when in Dark Mode on tvOS 13.3 or earlier. (62328605)

Workaround: Add a symbol glyph to the app’s asset catalog.

items.text: Restored image-loading performance for apps in Dark Mode on devices running iOS 13.3 or earlier. (61200701) (FB7648891)
items.html: Restored image-loading performance for apps in Dark Mode on devices running iOS 13.3 or earlier. (61200701) (FB7648891)

items.text: Symbol names are no longer printed in stack frames in the console by default, as this combination can result in deadlocks when running Thread Sanitizer on simulated devices. For schemes that don’t have the option to gather code coverage enabled, you can re-enable symbol names and source locations by adding a TSAN_OPTIONS environment variable with the value symbolize=1 in the scheme editor. (61840387)
items.html:
Symbol names are no longer printed in stack frames in the console by default, as this combination can result in deadlocks when running Thread Sanitizer on simulated devices.

For schemes that don’t have the option to gather code coverage enabled, you can re-enable symbol names and source locations by adding a TSAN_OPTIONS environment variable with the value symbolize=1 in the scheme editor. (61840387)

items.text: Fixed a crash that could occur with connect-to-source when Control-dragging an object over a class with an @end keyword that shares a line with the previous item. (61957256)
items.html: Fixed a crash that could occur with connect-to-source when Control-dragging an object over a class with an @end keyword that shares a line with the previous item. (61957256)

items.text: genstrings continues to look for additional instances of a localization token, such as “Text”, after finding it as part of an identifier. (61903372)
items.html: genstrings continues to look for additional instances of a localization token, such as “Text”, after finding it as part of an identifier. (61903372)

items.text: When performing string extraction, genstrings only interprets SwiftUI constructs within Swift files. (60440513, 61903448)
items.html: When performing string extraction, genstrings only interprets SwiftUI constructs within Swift files. (60440513, 61903448)

items.text: Restored disclosure triangles for revealing the contents of playground books in Xcode’s project navigator. (61902475)
items.html: Restored disclosure triangles for revealing the contents of playground books in Xcode’s project navigator. (61902475)

items.text: Fixed an issue that prevented automatic signing from making changes if the app IDs used a seed prefix and not a team ID prefix. (59672760) (FB7593038)
items.html: Fixed an issue that prevented automatic signing from making changes if the app IDs used a seed prefix and not a team ID prefix. (59672760) (FB7593038)

items.text: Fixed some issues where Xcode would sometimes fail to run an app in a simulated device, with an error “Timed out waiting for Simulator.app to become ready”. (57050823, 62542482) (FB7437899)
items.html: Fixed some issues where Xcode would sometimes fail to run an app in a simulated device, with an error “Timed out waiting for Simulator.app to become ready”. (57050823, 62542482) (FB7437899)

items.text: Fixed a crash that could occur when invoking Siri in a simulated device. (62333338)
items.html: Fixed a crash that could occur when invoking Siri in a simulated device. (62333338)

items.text: Fixed a crash that could occur when using an opaque result type whose underlying type was not public. (60951353, 61902210) (FB7641416)
items.html: Fixed a crash that could occur when using an opaque result type whose underlying type was not public. (60951353, 61902210) (FB7641416)

items.text: Fixed a crash that occured when declaring a property with an attached property wrapper that had the same name as another property in the same scope. (61902377)
items.html: Fixed a crash that occured when declaring a property with an attached property wrapper that had the same name as another property in the same scope. (61902377)
